AUROC=0.6849650301033108	AUPRC=0.7072446854915488	Accuracy=0.6271409749670619	MCC=0.2598941659100292	Recall=0.5699745547073791	Precision=0.6627218934911243	f1_score=0.612859097127223

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.60      0.69      0.64       366
        case       0.66      0.57      0.61       393

    accuracy                           0.63       759
   macro avg       0.63      0.63      0.63       759
weighted avg       0.63      0.63      0.63       759
